outputs.output_descr:
This project will promote the mainstreaming of Sustainable Land Management in St. Vincent and the Grenadines through institutional, individual and systemic capacity building.  Institutional capacity building will be directed at creating synergies to facilitiate maximization of resources in the effective delivery of technical support to government agencies, the private sector, community based organizations and civil society.  The outputs associated with this project are:-  
Output 1:  Sustainable Land Management mainstreamed into national developed policies, plans and regulatory framework.
Output 2:  Individual and instrituional capacities for sustainable land management development.
Output 3:  Capacities for knowledge management in support of sustainable land managmement developed.  
Output 4:  Invesment planning & resource mobilization for implementation of sustainable land management interventions elaborated.  
Output 5:  Adaptive management and learning.

project_descr: CAPACITY BUILDING AND MAINSTREAMING OF SUSTAINABLE LAND MANAGEMENT IN ST. VINCENT AND THE GRENADINES.
